entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
